mapper.select:
select
from sys_role where hidden = 0 and status != 2
AND code like concat(#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND name like concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
